Objective: Verify navigating to Transactions page from My Account Transactions link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Open the site in any supported browser
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click 'Your transactions!' link
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Transactions Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Transactions Page

Objective: Verify navigating to Transactions page from Transactions right column options
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Open the site in any supported browser
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click Transactions in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Transactions Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Transactions Page

Objective: Verify Transactions Page when there are no Transactions
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Open the site in any supported browser
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click Transactions in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Transactions Page and a text "You do not have any Transactions!" should be shown
Actual Result: The User is taken to Transactions Page and a text "You do not have any Transactions!" is shown

Objective: Verify Continue button in Transactions page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Open the site in any supported browser
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click Transactions in right column options
4) Click Continue button
Expected Result: The User should be taken to My Account Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to My Account Page

Objective: Verify Transactions when there are a few Transactions
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders and complete a few transactions
Test Steps:
1) Open the site in any supported browser
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click Transactions in right column options
Expected Result: The details of Transactions should be shown in table format

Objective: Verify the Transactions Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders and complete a few transactions
Test Steps:
1) Open the site in any supported browser
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click Transactions in right column options
4) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The Transactions Page should work in all supported environments
